scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, wearing a green turban and a blue robe over a red tunic, is seated and writing in a book propped on an easel. He holds a quill in his right hand, poised over the text. Beside him, a small lamb rests on the ground. The background suggests an interior space with a dark wall and a patterned curtain or tapestry on the right. The scene likely depicts a scribe or a prophet engaged in writing.
